price: 27. Mpe bokonzi bwa likolo na mabele ezali ya Allah. Mpe tango mokolo wana mokokokaka, bato ya lokuta bakozangaka.
arabic: وَلِلَّهِ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَيَوۡمَ تَقُومُ ٱلسَّاعَةُ يَوۡمَئِذٖ يَخۡسَرُ ٱلۡمُبۡطِلُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: walillahi mul'ku al-samāwāti wal-arḍi wayawma taqūmu al-sāʿatu yawma-idhin yakhsaru al-mub'ṭilūna
